text: Cloning of the <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter , construction of mutant <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter , and <extra_id_0> RUNX <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression plasmids .

The <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter was cloned into the pGL3 basic vector ( Promega Biotech ) to generate pGL3 <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> -511 / +176 ( Mantel et al . , 2006 ) .

Site - directed mutagenesis for the three putative RUNX binding sites in the <extra_id_0> FOXP3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> promoter region was introduced using the QuickChange kit ( Stratagene ) , according to the manufacturer 's instructions and confirmed by sequencing the DNA .

The following primers and their complementary strands were used : foxp runx-333 , forward 5'-CACTTTTGTTTTAAAAACTGTCCTTTCTCATGAGCCCTATTATC-3 ' ; foxp runx-333 reverse 5'-GATAATAGGGCTCATGAGAAAGGACAGTTTTTAAAACAAAAGTG-3 ' ; foxp runx-287 forward 5'-CCTCTCACCTCTGTCCTGAGGGGAAGAAATC-3 ' ; foxp runx-287 reverse 5'-GATTTCTTCCCCTCAGGACAGAGGTGAGAGG-3 ' ; foxp runx-53 forward 5'-GCTTCCACACCGTACAGCGTCCTTTTTCTTCTCGGTATAAAAG-3 ' ; foxp runx-53 reverse 5'-CTTTTATACCGAGAAGAAAAAGGACGCTGTACGGTGTGGAAGC-3 ' .

The human <extra_id_0> RUNX1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> fragment from the Addgene plasmid 12504 ( Biggs et al . , 2006 ) pFlagCMV2-AML1B was sub-cloned in the pEGFPN1 vector ( Clontech Laboratories ) .

The <extra_id_0> RUNX3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> vector pCMV human <extra_id_0> RUNX3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , which was a gift from K . Ito ( Institute of Molecular and Cell Biology , Proteos , Singapore ) was subcloned into pEGFPN1 vector ( Clontech Laboratories ; Yamamura et al . , 2006 ) .
